# Archimedean Copulae {#archimedean}

Here is a review of existing methods.
Need to double-check an actual book or some other literature on archimedean copulae, especially when it comes to domain of the association parameter $\theta$.

## Ali-Mikhail-Haq Copula

$\theta \in [0, 1)$

## Clayton Copula

$\theta \in (0, \infty)$.
For dimension $d = 2$, $\theta \in (-1, \infty)$ is admissible.

## Frank Copula

$\theta \in (-\infty, +\infty)$

## Gumbel Copula

$\theta \in [1, \infty)$


## Joe Copula

$\theta \in [1, \infty)$
